data.name: Don't freak out
data.detailed_description:
Don’t freak out Game Description


In this game the levels are designed extra heavy and they get harder with each level. You also have to defeat enemies to get ahead. You can collect coins in the levels that you can use in the in-game shop. The next levels are unlocked by reaching a certain range in the game or by unlocking the next level with the coins you can collect in the levels.

Don’t freak out Features


  • Extra difficult level design
  • Collect coins and get in-game items
  • Defeat opponents to move forward and Loot drop chance

Don’t freak out Multiplayer


By the end of 2022, a multiplayer will be released, where you can compete against your friends or other online players.

data.short_description: Don’t freak out is a first person Jump and Run. All levels are designed extra heavy and they get more and more difficult with each level.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7/8/10 (64 bits)
  • Processor: Intel i5 or new-gen i3 / AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics:
  • Storage: 70 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7/8/10 (64 bits)
  • Processor: Intel i7 or AMD equivalent (AMD FX 9500+ Series)
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics:
  • Storage: 70 MB available space
